sentences.english: Would you like a sit on the deck-chair?
sentences.chinese: 在躺椅上坐一會兒好嗎？

sentences.english: He takes out his cigarettes and goes out to the back with a can of beer. ~ see him sit in the lawn chair and pick up the newspaper again.
sentences.chinese: 我看見他坐到草坪上的躺椅裏，又抄起了報紙。

sentences.english: Magna was lying on a chaise longue.
sentences.chinese: 瑪格娜躺在一把躺椅上。

sentences.english: A man sat in a recliner drinking beer .
sentences.chinese: 一個男人坐在活動躺椅上喝啤酒。

sentences.english: He slept much. After breakfast he sought his deck-chair with a magazine he never finished.
sentences.chinese: 他睡得很多，一喫完早飯就拿一本雜誌去找他的躺椅。

sentences.english: I have had my best success when I sleep in a recliner .
sentences.chinese: 我最成功的一次是當我躺在躺椅上睡著的那次。

sentences.english: After breakfast he sought his deck-chair with a magazine he never finished.
sentences.chinese: 早飯後拿着一本雜誌摸回躺椅。

sentences.english: Clipper-built deck chair, comfortable siesta can be in summer cannot little spouse.
sentences.chinese: 流線型的躺椅，夏日裏可是舒適午睡不可少的伴侶。

sentences.english: Le Corbusier LC4 "lounge" chair " super " hard.
sentences.chinese: 勒柯布西耶的躺椅LC4超硬。

sentences.english: I have set a sun lounger on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 我已經在沙灘上放了一張日光躺椅。

sentences.english: Some of the couches will be equipped with baby seat anchors and some will not.
sentences.chinese: 一些躺椅配有固定嬰兒座位的裝置，有的沒有。

definition: sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
